titleStmt.title: The honor of chastity A sermon, made and preached by Iohn Featly.
titleStmt.author: Featley, John, 1605?-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. P[urslowe] for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sold at his shop, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,
